slides.subject: KannaKlaus character with festive background - event announcement
style_requirements: KannaKlaus character prominently featured (center or bottom)
Festive gradient background (red to green) OR illustrated winter scene
slides.ai_prompt_template:
Create a festive Instagram post graphic (1080x1080px) for "KANNA KICKBACK 6" event announcement.

Main text: "KANNA KICKBACK 6" in huge bold letters
Date: "Friday, December 6th ‚Ä¢ 2-6 PM"
Location: "Ginza, Gold Canyon, AZ"
Subtitle: "Holiday Party ‚Ä¢ Toy Drive ‚Ä¢ Community Love"

Style: Festive holiday poster with cannabis theme
Character: KannaKlaus (Santa with cannabis elements) in center
Colors: Forest green, holiday red, festive gold
Background: Gradient or winter wonderland scene
Decorations: Cannabis leaf snowflakes, ornaments, twinkling lights

Vibe: Fun, inviting, festive, community-focused, scrollstopping

Title: "6 YEARS OF GIVING BACK"

Data visualization (bar chart):
- 2022: $4,200 (shorter bar, light green)

- 2024: $6,500 (tall bar, bright green)
- 2025: $7,000+ (tallest bar, gold - with upward arrow)

Bottom text:
"Every toy goes to the Sojourner Center"
"Fun first. Charity always."

slides.subject: List of event activities with icons

text_overlay.bottom_text: Free to attend. Bring a toy, get a gift bag.

Festive pattern or solid color background

slides.subject: 4-step process flow for toy drive participation

steps.title: DROP A TOY
steps.description: Nov 15 - Dec 15 at dispensaries & community spots
steps.locations: Locations: Ginza, Fancy Pets, Amaranth + more!

steps.title: GET A GIFT BAG
steps.description: New, unwrapped toy = gift bag with goodies & prizes

style_requirements: Vertical flow (top to bottom) with numbered steps
Each step a different shade of green/gold
slides.ai_prompt_template:
Create an Instagram process graphic (1080x1080px) explaining the KK6 toy drive.

Title: "HOW THE TOY DRIVE WORKS"

4-step vertical process flow:

STEP 1: DROP A TOY
(Icon: Toy box)
"Nov 15 - Dec 15 at dispensaries & community spots"
"Locations: Ginza, Fancy Pets, Amaranth + more!"

STEP 2: GET A GIFT BAG
(Icon: Gift bag)
"New, unwrapped toy = gift bag with goodies & prizes"

STEP 3: PULL UP TO KK6
(Icon: Party/celebration)
"Celebrate Dec 6th"

STEP 4: WE DELIVER
(Icon: Delivery truck or heart)
"Toys to Sojourner Center"

Bottom: "Everybody wins. Everybody eats."

Style: Clean process diagram with arrows connecting steps
Colors: Green gradient (light to dark through steps)
Icons: Simple, bold, friendly
Background: Cream or white
